alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Bernard, southwestern Orleans, northwestern Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Timberlane. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Marrero, Harvey, Avondale, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Metairie, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Westwego, Woodmere, Elmwood, Violet, Terrytown, Meraux, Bridge City, Poydras and Estelle. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 228 and 237. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
